scripts.install:all: npm run install:web && npm run install:backend
scripts.dev: npx concurrently "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:backend
scripts.start: npx concurrently "npm run start:web" "npm run start:backend"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:web && npm run lint:backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:web && npm run clean:backend
